parameters.definition: Weekly salary for a senior accountant
Weekly salary for a junior accountant
Minimum required number of senior accountants
The ratio of the number of senior accountants to junior accountants

description: An accounting firm has senior accountants earning \param{WageSenior} per week and junior accountants earning \param{WageJunior} per week. The contracts with companies to provide accounting services require at least \param{MinAccountants} accountants, of whom at least \param{MinSenior} must be senior accountants. To make sure there is enough experience on the accounting team, the number of senior accountants should be at least \param{RatioSeniorJunior} of the number of junior accountants. The firm wants to keep the weekly wage bill below \param{MaxWageBill}. Formulate an LP to minimize the wage bill.
